high_descs: Walk slightly left and then forward around to the long side of the kitchen island
Pick up the large pot from the kitchen island
Turn left and walk around the kitchen island to the kitchen sink
Put the pot into the kitchen sink
anns.task_desc: Put the pot into the kitchen sink

high_descs: Turn left, turn right, walk to the side of the table
Grab the pot on the table
Turn left and walk to the sink
Put the pot in the sink
anns.task_desc: Move the pot from the table to the sink

high_descs: Turn left, go forward, then turn right, then turn right at the kitchen island.
Pick up the pot on the kitchen island.
Turn left, go straight, then turn right, go forward, then turn left to face the sink.
Put the pot in the sink.
anns.task_desc: Put a pot in the sink.
